body:
You can use ngOnChanges() instead of ngOnInit()

ngOnChanges(changes) {
  if(this.passed_id != -5) {
    this.http.get(...)
  }
}

You can also make passed_id a setter

_passed_id:number;
@Input set passed_id(value:number) {
  this._passed_id = value;
  if(this.passed_id != -5) {
    this.http.get(...)
  } 
}
title: Angular 2 - @Input - Await async method
